Key.English: ALiVE is an Arma 3 Mod that enhances MP play with a more strategic enemy, enhanced combat ambience, combat support, logistics and revolutionary mission persistence and online statistics. Please Donate at http://alivemod.com/#Donate
A massive thank you to Johari, the band that created two incredible and exclusive tracks for ALiVE - This is War and Everest. Go to www.johariofficial.com for more!
